Whether the app is in a Salesforce sandbox or not. If you do not know what this is, assume it as false. We provide more info on this field in the docs.
Salesforce Refresh Token used for Airbyte to access your Salesforce account. If you don't know what this is, follow this guide to retrieve it.

Date in the format YYYY-MM-DD. Any data before this date will not be replicated. This field uses the "updated" field if available, otherwise the "created" fields if they are available for a stream. If not set, then by default all your data is replicated.Examples: 2021-07-25, 2021-07-25T00:00:00ZThis field uses the "updated" field if available, otherwise the "created" fields if they are available for a stream.
